casebody.data:
Luisa C. ESPOSITO, Appellant,
v.
Allen H. ISAAC, etc., et al., Respondents. Motion No: 2018-257 Court of Appeals of New York. June 7, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that the Court of Appeals does not have jurisdiction to entertain this motion for leave to appeal from the order of the Appellate Division entered in this action commenced in Civil Court of the City of New York (see NY Const. art VI, § 3 [b][7]; CPLR 5602 ).
